page.title: 10INSTOW BROWNIES
page.content: The Brownies is the name given to a national group of young girls aged between 7 and 10 years old. They meet once a week under the leadership of Brown Owl, Tawny Owl and Snowy Owl. They earn badges by performing well at their chosen subject. The Brownies organise themselves into Sixers. They are the Elves, Gnomes, Pixies and Imps. They stand in a circle and dance and sing around the Toadstool. They have a really good time as well as learning how to behave with respect and kindness to others. Many of the girls living in this area are Brownies.
